summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing execution of a grant agreement with the United States Department of Justice for the Comprehensive Communities Grant Program; accepting the money when received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1995 budgets of the Police Department, Department of Neighborhoods, Department of Parks and Recreation, Department of Housing and Human Services, Seattle Center, and the Municipal Court; making reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund Supplemental Appropriation Subfund; and declaring the emergency therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
